org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class GlobalOptimizationSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.AbstractGameSolver<MemorylessStrategy>
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.GlobalOptimizationSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, GameSolver<MemorylessStrategy>

    public class GlobalOptimizationSolver
extends AbstractGameSolver<MemorylessStrategy>
    This class provides a game solver for parity games with global optimizations that does not depend on any specific game solver.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      The option of decomposing the game into strongly-connected components.

      The option of the name of the delegated parity game solver.
